FX_EXPORT Fetion_MSG * fx_get_msg (long uid)
 get the uid 's message.

Function Documentation

Fetion_MSG * fx_get_msg ( long  uid  ) 

get the uid 's message.

Parameters:
uid The message 's sender.
you should usr the fx_destroy_msg function to destroy the msg which you get

Returns:
NULL if the uid no send message, or Fetion_MSG a struct which store message info.
See also:
FX_NEW_MESSAGE fx_destroy_msg
